actions.committee: Senate Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Capital Transportation Act of 1969 to authorize an additional appropriation of $211,000,000 for the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit System.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $211,000,000 to be used as a direct Federal payment to the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority to continue the construction of the Washington Metrorail System in fiscal year 1976.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Capital Transportation Act of 1969 to authorize an additional appropriation of $211,000,000 for the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit System.
